Interface Constants

All Known Subinterfaces:
Player
All Known Implementing Classes:
Board, Game, GraphicGame, NaivePlayer, RandomPlayer, TextGame
public interface Constants

This interface define certain constants which are used in all subsequent classes.

Field Summary

          The black player, which plays the first
static int NONE
          Represents no player
static int SIZE
          The game will be played on a 9X9 board
static int WHITE
          The white player
